H0.text: The Ore Mountains form a border between Germany and which country. Poland

H1.text: The Ore Mountains form a border between Germany and which country. Austria

H2.text: The Ore Mountains form a border between Germany and which country. Switzerland

H3.text: The Ore Mountains form a border between Germany and which country. ČR

A4.text: The Ore Mountains lie along the Czech–German border, separating the historical regions of Bohemia in the Czech Republic and Saxony in Germany.

A5.text: The Ore Mountains lie along the Czech–German border
